title: Column icons don't show up when connecting to a Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons do not show up in the Edit Data Set window.
EB: Currently, when connecting to a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons are not displayed in the Edit Data Set window.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a new project. 
2. Create a new report. 
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and select the option to connect to a Derby database. Provide the following details: 
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver 
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui 
   - User Name: root 
   - Password: root 
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select the Query option. 
6. [Missing details: Please specify what should be done in the Edit Data Set window that causes the column icons not to show up.]
